articles.author: Asian News International
articles.title: India Won't Travel To Pakistan For Asia Cup, To Play Games At Neutral Venue: Report - NDTV Sports
articles.description: According to a report, the Asia Cup 2023 is likely to be held in Pakistan, but India will play their games at a neutral venue.
articles.content: The Asia Cup 2023 is likely to be held in Pakistan, but India will play their games at a neutral venue. After a brief stalemate, the Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) and Pakistan Cricket … [+2599 chars]

articles.title: China Proposes ‘Twelve Point’ Peace Plan To End Ukraine War As Beijing, Moscow Seek To Blunt US Supremacy - EurAsian Times
articles.description: Chinese President Xi Jinping was on a three–day visit to Moscow, after which he is scheduled to land in Kyiv. In a joint statement issued at the end of the second day of the Xi-Putin meeting in Moscow, the two sides touched on various current and long-term is…
articles.content: Chinese President Xi Jinping was on a threeday visit to Moscow, after which he is scheduled to land in Kyiv. In a joint statement issued at the end of the second day of the Xi-Putin meeting in Moscow… [+5182 chars]
